name: Beats Battle
description:
Beats Battle, a rhythm party game for up to 4 local players. Synchronize your movements with the rhythm. Show your skills on the dance floor. Push enemies. Be the only remaining competitor. Made with great effort by a team of 5 talented people (and special thanks to Darlan and Johny for the teaser work and additional music track) , passionate about games. At the moment we don't have the financial support to go beyond a demo, but each of us gave our heart and soul to the project and we are very proud of the result. We hope you have a lot of fun with the original concept that came out of our dedicated work.

Made by some brazilian guys:

  • André Tenório
  • Francisco Matias
  • Lucas Oliveira
  • Marcos Pereira
  • Vitor Malcher
